Hi An,


We've cleared the site cache that might causing the issue. Can you please refresh again and clear your cache? 


If the issue still occurs, can you send me a screenshot?


Thanks!

Hi Joel,


We can still see the two gaps between Mc Donald St, Mortlake and Little St, Mosman.


Could you please check it again? Thank you!


Kind Regards,

Hi An, 


Confirming the issue is fixed. Please refresh the page and see the updates.


Here's the link for you to check. https://advantagestyling.com.au/recent-projects/


Thanks!
Heath Maguire all good on this one.
Joel Maligalig can you please fix this one and reply to the client once it's done? Thanks!!

Hi Heath,


I found other page with Gallery responsive problem


It’s on this page: https://advantagestyling.com.au/recent-projects/


There are two places where we can find a big gap between features images.


(See screen shot attached)


Could you fix it for us.


Thank you Heath

Hi An, 


We have fixed up the issue you were experiencing. Please refresh your page to see the updates. 😊


Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire All good now. Cheers!

Joel Maligalig These are the pages:
https://advantagestyling.com.au/gallery/
https://advantagestyling.com.au/featured/ (once you click the LOAD MORE) button

Hi An, 


Sure we will look into this for you and send you an update. 


Thanks and speak soon,

Hi Heath,


We noticed on the Gallery Page, all the feature images are not displayed correctly according to the grid. There is an empty gap between “Bedroom" and “Outdoor” photo.

This also happened in Recent Projects, there are two empty gap between “Cremorne House” and “Coogee Apartment”.( See screenshots attached.)

Could you please fix this ? Thank you Heath

Kind Regards,


An Phuong Gorham

Marketing & Design Executive

From: Heath from WP Perk <heath.maguire@wp-perk.intercom-mail.com>

Subject: Re: Fwd: Website amendment - ABOUT page.


an@advantagestyling.com.au was added to the conversation by Heath Maguire


HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

Begin forwarded message:


From: An Phuong Gorham <an@advantagestyling.com.au>

Subject: Website amendment - ABOUT page.

Date: 5 April 2018 at 12:18:29 pm AEST

To: "heath@wolfiq.com.au" <heath@wolfiq.com.au>

Cc: Dan Gerber <dan@advantagestyling.com.au>


Hi Heath,


Hope you’re well.


We would love to make some amendment on the “ABOUT ” Page.


Could you please:


  • Change “Meet the Stylists” into “Meet our Property Stylists” ?
  • Add “Meet our Interior Designers” on the left side tab, and below “Meet our Property Stylists”
  • Also add “Meet our Interior Designers” on the drop down underneath ABOUT. (It should be between Meet the Property Stylist and Company History)
  • Put “Luisa Volpato” into the “Meet our Interior Designers” section. We want to separate Luisa from the rest of the Property Stylists. (I will add one more Interior Designer Vanessa Babic on this section after you have made the change)

The ABOUT page should be in this order:


Meet our Property Stylists

Meet our Interior Designers

Company History

  • On "Meet our Property Stylists" should only have Kristy Burridge, Madeleine Kortt, Peter Seargeant and Sarah Toland now.


Thank you Heath.

Kind regards,



An Phuong Gorham

Marketing & Design Executive

Advantage Property Styling

PO Box 7125, ALEXANDRIA NSW 2015
